location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to James Orton, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter places James Orton in temporary charge of the Residency while William Bruce is attending to public business in Muscat. Includes instructions on how to deal with public letters and deliveries of arms or stores. Also includes a list of packages and letters addressed to His Excellency Sir Gore Ouseley.
